<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Take the Wheel](/Feats.aspx?ID=3142) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Trick Driver](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=112)

**Prerequisites**
[Trick Driver Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3140); Expert in [Driving Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8)

**Requirements**
You are adjacent to a [vehicle's](Vehicles.aspx) point of entry.

</column>

---

Diving into a moving vehicle and seizing the controls is nothing new for you. You [Board](/Actions.aspx?ID=482) and [Take Control](/Actions.aspx?ID=486) of the adjacent vehicle.
